Description:
Annotation on the envelope: "Rubens Eberjagd – Dresden Zeichnung zur Eberjagd (Berlin KK 593)"

- First subfolder (Annotation: "Rubens Zeichnung zur Eberjagd Berlin K.K.593") addressed (inside) to "Herrn Prof. Dr. Evers Darmstadt Kunstgeschichtliches Institut der T. H. Hochschulstr. 1" and dated 04.08.1960:
    - Notes about the drawings of 'The Boar Hunt'
- Invoices and other documents 
- Correspondence with Pantheon and E. Ruhmer (dated 1961), with the Kunsthistorisches Institut der Universität des Saarlandes (dated 1961), with Hermann Phleps (dated 1961), with Eberhard Hanfstaengl, with Fedja Anzelewsky (dated 1960), with Lugt (dated 1949), with Santo Bey de Semo (dated 1943), with Hans Latteier (dated 1968), with H. B. Trevor Cox Esq. (dated 1968) and with Bruno Lohse (dated 1968)
- Bibliographic references
- Draft text: "Zu einem Blatt mit Zeichnungen, von Rubens, im Berliner Kupferstichkabinett"
- Extracts from different publications
- Second subfolder:
    - Correspondence with Eberhard Ruhmer dated 1960
    - Draft text: "Zu einem Blatt mit Zeichnungen, von Rubens, im Berliner Kupferstichkabinett" 
    - Photos of sketches (caryatids, horsemen, horn blower, etc.)
- Reproductions of the 'Landscape at the Sunset' and 'The Boar Hunt'
- Article: 'Landschaftsrapport von P. P. Rubens. Unbekannter Brief zum "Blick auf den Escorial" ' in "Die Neue Zeitung" dated 1950
- Various notes
- Photocopies of a 'Madonna and Child'
 
  
Loose documentation in the Rubensdocumentation of the Rubenianum:   
     
- 2 photos of Mary with the Child (Rubenianum "Evers 1993" stamp on the back)
- Photo with a sketch of a greek temple and statues
